text: what could you what did you see
a Fed Continental when you showed up
after more when we arrived at the scene
on the third floor it was a four-story
building we wanted to put some
explosives on the front door but when we
release the charges the door did not
fully open so we had to put another
charge in before we could detonate we
were shot at with machine-gun us could
you hear them speaking were they
speaking to you did they shout at you no
offense the assault team one and a half
two meters away from the front door
never heard the terrorists speak but a
sharpshooter heard one of the women
terrorists speak and she pretended that
she wanted to give herself up we think
it was an excuse to get us to enter the
flat so that more policemen would die
when her explosives detonated
